title: Samsung’s Galaxy S22 series doesn’t seem to benefit from more powerful 45W charging
content:
One key point of Samsung’s Galaxy S22 series is its ability to charge at a whopping 45W, far faster than most mainstream flagship phones today. However, an analysis of charging speeds on the Galaxy S22 series suggests that 45W input doesn’t actually provide a benefit compared to less powerful adapters.

more…

The post Samsung’s Galaxy S22 series doesn’t seem to benefit from more powerful 45W charging appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: An analysis of charging speeds on the Galaxy S22 series suggests that the touted 45W speeds don't actually make a difference.
